
ds_extreme_obs Extreme observations

#### Description 
 
Returns the most extreme observations.

#### Usage 
<pre><code>

ds_extreme_obs(data, column)

</code></pre>
#### Arguments 
 
* ``data`` : A data.frame or tibble.
* ``column`` :  Column in data.

#### Examples 
```{r}

ds_extreme_obs(mtcarz, mpg)
```
